FAQ

Is my data sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

What is TOML?

TOML (Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language) is a configuration file format that's easy to read and write.

What formats are supported?

You can convert between TOML, JSON, and YAML formats. All directions are supported with customizable options.

Can I customize the output format?

Yes, you can choose YAML indentation (2 or 4 spaces) and enable/disable pretty printing for JSON output.
